alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Liberty; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 19 at 3:44AM EDT until March 20 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM EDT /1 AM CDT/ TO 9 AM EDT /8 AM CDT/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...In Florida, Inland Bay, Calhoun, Gadsden, Liberty and South Walton Counties. In Georgia, Tift, Ben Hill, Irwin, Colquitt and Grady Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM EDT /1 AM CDT/ to 9 AM EDT /8 AM CDT/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Liberty; South Walton
